name: 陳文斌
objective:
生物力學是一門整合生物醫學與力學的學科。本課程涵蓋生物力學基礎概念與理論之介紹，並分別討論以下各主題：(1) 生物力學概論、(2) 植入物與矯具、(3) 骨骼生物力學、(4) 髖關節生物力學、(5) 膝關節生物力學、(6) 足部生物力學、(7) 脊椎生物力學、(8) 牙科生物力學、(9) 人體動作分析、(10) 電腦輔助工程分析在生物力學之應用。各主題中亦將介紹各式植入物與輔具於臨床醫學上之應用。

Biomechanics is a multi-disciplinary science which integrates biomedical and mechanical subjects. This course covers the basic principles of biomechanics and its applications in the following topics: (1) Introduction to biomechanics; (2) Prosthetics and orthotics; (3) Bone mechanics; (4) Hip joint biomechanics; (5) Knee joint biomechanics; (6) Biomechanics of foot and footwear; (7) Spine biomechanics; (8) Dental biomechanics; (9) Human motion analysis; (10) Applications of CAE in biomechanics. The related prothetic and orthotic devices will also be introduced in selected topics.
